mapper.insert: INSERT INTO archive_reply(archive_reply_writer, archive_reply_content, archive_NO, archive_reply_NO) VALUES (#{archiveReplyWriter}, #{archiveReplyContent}, #{archiveNo}, #{archiveReplyNo})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS rn, A.* FROM ( SELECT ar.archive_reply_NO, ar.archive_reply_writer, ar.archive_reply_content, ar.archive_reply_date, ar.archive_NO, u.user_NO, u.user_ID, c.company_NO, c.company_ID FROM archive_reply ar LEFT OUTER JOIN user u ON ar.archive_reply_writer = u.user_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN company c ON ar.archive_reply_writer = c.company_ID WHERE archive_NO = #{archiveNo} ORDER BY archive_reply_NO DESC ) A,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0)B ) B
WHERE rn > 0 AND rn <= #{paging.pageNum} * #{paging.cpp}
